abstract: BP has said it will raise $30 billion to pay claims relating to the Gulf spill. It has raised $11 billion so far.
snippet: BP has said it will raise $30 billion to pay claims relating to the Gulf spill. It has raised $11 billion so far.
lead_paragraph: MOSCOW  BP raised $1.8 billion on Monday to help pay for the cost of the oil spill in the Gulf of Mexico by selling assets in Venezuela and Vietnam to its own joint venture in Russia.

headline.main: BP Sale Raises $1.8 Billion to Help Pay for Gulf Spill
headline.print_headline: BP Sale Raises $1.8 Billion To Help Pay for Gulf Spill
